name: docker-socket-proxy
description: Docker Socket Proxy is a secure proxy for the Docker socket, designed to expose only specific actions through HTTP. It helps isolate and restrict container management operations safely using granular authorization.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Safely expose Docker socket over HTTP. Controlled container management

features.title: REST API
features.description: Restrict specific Docker API actions. Fine-grained security control

features.title: Isolation Layer
features.description: Protect Docker daemon from direct exposure. Enhanced security posture

features.title: Http Proxy
features.description: Access Docker operations through standard HTTP. Easy integration

features.title: Permission Control
features.description: Define exactly which operations are allowed. Minimize attack surface

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own secure Docker proxy. Complete control over access
